content.detailedDescription: I was sitting with my wife on the deck watching the night sky. the sun had set an hour before and the stars were becoming very bright. there were no clouds in the sky. an object as least as bright as the brightest star, appeared suddenly, above the horizon, within our field of view. the object looked like it could have been a star or a satellite, but it moved quickly across the sky and changed direction, in a manner very unlike a satellite or airplane. it moved as though it could have been an insect, a lightning bug, although it did not blink and traversed a large portion the visible night sky. we both thought and felt that the object was an et entity and it had a powerful impact that correlated with the discussion we were having at the time. the object moved from the southern sky, over head, and off to the north west sky, where it disappeared abruptly. it remained at full brightness the entire time it was in our view, and it made it's appearence above the horizon, and it disappeared while it was still above the horizon. it was visible for approximately 20 seconds. it was not possible to know how high it was flying, and there was no sound associated with it that we could hear.
content.summary: The weather was warm and the sky was clear. a star like object moved through the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside and looking at the stars on a clear night. we first noticed to the object with its blinking lights moving across the sky from south to east and back about 12 times. we thought the object was a satalitle and the. we saw the shape of the object. it was blinking blue red and a grayish and it was movi g in a straight line from south to east and back anout 12 times. i was surprised and curious what it was and if there were any other sightings in the area. we lost sight of the object when it went by the trees and then we went inside.
content.summary: Disk like with blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: While driving east on hwy 62 approaching mcdowell rd and usi observed a bright white solid light above treetop hovering. immediately grabbed my phone to try to get video but object appeared to begin moving s/se and within seconds disappeared. did not appear to reach an elevation to go behind cloud cover. lights did not appear to flash and apparent distance to me ruled out a plane from evansville regional.
content.summary: Unknown light near usi

content.detailedDescription:
It was summer 1985...Probably june.  i was 10...Almost 11 years old.  i believe it was around 9pm or 10pm and was walking with my friend across the street from my house to his house to sleep over.

it was a clear night.

we both looked up and saw a triangular shaped craft fly at just above treetop level...At about maybe 35mph.

the triangular craft was...To the best of my knowledge...An equilateral triangle...With round corners.  the perimeter of the craft was a glowing green outline.  it made no sound except swishing wind.

within seconds of the triangular craft passing by a glowing green orb chased after it.  the orb was perceived to be about half the size of the triangular craft and moved at the same speed.  i heard no sound.

a few seconds after the orb was seen...A very large craft of indeterminate size flew by on the same course.  it had many small indicator lights.  some of the trees swayed underneath it.
i was very excited, but have no further memory except that at some point i ran back inside my house to tell my parents what i saw.

i want to say that the large craft was cigar shaped, but i'm just not sure.

i estimate the triangular craft was about the size of a modern jet fighter, the orb was like some kind of drone, and the large ship was about the size of a modern navy destroyer...Or slightly smaller.
content.summary: 3 objects seen passing overhead; triangle, glowing orb, large craft of indeterminate shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was up late. saw what i thought was lighting flashes. ignored them at first but when i heard no thunder i walked outside onto a screened in porch. another short flashed directed my attention to the tree line by the house and an object just above the trees which then settled behind the trees above a large ravine. i just looked at it a moment, not knowing what to do. then i felt an energy around me; i could not see it but felt it. from a certain angle i could see a laser of some kind, not the whole time, it came on and went off a number of times as the energy began to  make my hairs stand on end. 

then i began to have thoughts of her in my head. this is  hard to explain. it was not as though she was communicating with me telepathically, it was as though she was planting memories of conversations in my head, memories of conversations i had not had with her. she was human, i could just tell.
she warned me that time was running out, specifically because a "true" globalization was milestone of some kind, that was incompatible with our economic system. 

she told be "divine creature" only meant social being, that social beings were meant to live in unified tribal society, without separated elite and the labor classes, that our tribal culture was split by a mistake long ago by a rebellion they wee responsible for, that they were sorry for all the  suffering they caused humanity, that they had fought a war to free us, so that we could choose to return to tribal society again, but we did not choose too return to tribalism. we were betrayed by people who decided to claim the kingship of the beings who had enslaved us. they cannot intervene again. we must start the next rebellion to free ourselves from the ruling elite before they can aid us. our tribal culture was split and it must become unified again before we can ascend a join the celestial tribes. 

i have wrote everything down i could remember but i a starting to forget, but i got the impression that what the christians might call armageddon is more like a global rebellion of labor, followed by an act of suppression by the ruling elite, the final battle is a like a labor strike writ large.

the final battle between good and evil is a battle between tribal good and the evil of feudal slavery. we are not suppose to have a riling elite that owns and labor class that works and must turn over the wealth they create to those who claim t be entitled to it. she spent a long time on that point. the tree of knowledge is the knowledge of feudalism, and the feudal scheme. the forbidden fruit is the transfer of wealth from labor to the elite owner class; it is the fruit of other people's labor that the first false kings (or feudal humans) were forbidden to consume.

feudal humans are a hybrid, we are tribal beings living in a feudal society. we must return to feudalism before globalization occurs since the feudal economics are incompatible with a "closed ethical" system.

the feudal slavery is the "serpent" that entered the tribal garden. capitalism is a feudal economic system, capitalism is the snake grown large. capitalism is the midgard serpent, the evil wrapping around the earth in the final days. its all real. 

the eucharist was meant to teach us that we cannot take each other prosperity and call it interest and profit. to understand how bread and wine can be turned into flesh and blood, you only need to understand flesh and blood are first turned into bread and wine by the work of labor working with their own hands. to take claim the prosperity of people and consume it is to consume their lives and livelihood and cause them to suffer. it is a form of cannibalism. 
we are not brute beasts. we are social animals confined in a feudal cage. we must become tribal again before it is too late
content.summary: I got the impression she was a human female though i did not see her

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and my friend were walking along the beach after midnight. my friend stumbled in the darkness. something told me to look up, and there they were above the sea heading eastwards out to sea. three orbs in a triangle pattern appearing from the cloud and disappearing into the nest cloud. i stood there stunned. knowing that what i had seem was nothing like what i had ever seen before. there was no sound. i was overcome by the fact that i had seen intelligent life that i had no previous knowledge of.

at first i just saw one orb come out of the cloud then two more in a triangle shape. all travelling steadily in formation.
content.summary: Three glowing spheres appeared from cloud heading east over the sea and re entered cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I was staying in a vacation house on ocracoke island, nc and it was my first night there. i was staying in a room with a 2 sided view (almost 180 degree view) of the pamlico sound, and wa slying in my bed reading, it was about 2:30 am. i decided to turn off the lamp and go to bed, and was uncomfortably hot in bed, so i was lying with my eyes open. it had been perhas 10 to 15 minutes since i turned out my lamp, and the area outside (as well as inside) was very, completely dark (not many lights on the island, no streetlights). while atttemping to fall asleep, i saw a very very bright bluish-white object shoot out of the sound, heading from the southwest direction my feet were facing towards the northeast, heading over the island towards the ocean would be my guess. it trailed out of the water very quickly, but was very bright, bright enough to leave a "tail" behind it like a comet as it moved. i immediately recognized this as being odd and jumped up off of my bed and went to the window, but i could no longer see the object, as it had cleared the water and travelled away in such a short period of time. i stayed at the window and watched the vicintiy of the sound i could observe from my window, knowing this was a very odd thing to see. i had been searching the sky for about 5 minutes and was becoming hopeless i would see anything else out of the ordinary, when the object streaked back across my view and back into the sound, appearing to enter the water in th same vicinity of the area it had left. it also appeared just as bright as it had when i observed it leaving the water the same blueish white, same size, same characteritics, ect. it appeared to enter the water around the same 30-40 degree angle it had exited it at as well. after seeing it go back into the water, i woke up my girlfriend to tell her what i had witnessed. she did not believe me, however within a minute of the object re-entering the water and me waking her up, we both became aware of another light moving about the area. this was a circular, "orb" shaped object. whereupon the initial object i had seen exiting/entering the water had no distinct shape that i could observe, this new object was clearly spherical, and appeared to be larger than a softball but smaller than a basketball. it would appear in one object of the sky, blinking on and staying lit for indescriminate amounts of time, usually being lit with a white colored light for anywhere from 3-15 second intervals. the light it emmited was always white, however it changed in occurence and timing. it didnt blink, just came on and off the way a lightbulb or firefly would. this was no lighbulb or firefly however, one second we would observe it across the sound, and 15 seconds later it would be on the other side of the house, after another short period we would observe it somewhere else further or closer to us. i would say this object continued blinking on and off for about a 5 to 10 minute period, me and my girlfriend just watched it, wondering what it was, either of us figuring it out. we observed it "blink on and off" a total of probaly 20 to 25 times before it stopped. my girlfriend went back to bed after about 15 minutes of inactivity, i stayed up hoping to see it again but never did. i observed the next night and saw nothing. then, three days later, my stepfather struck up a conversation with the other guests at the house about a light he had seen the night earlier (the night of the 17th). he described seeing a blinking round object that would change location irratically, at one point being on this side of the island, only to blink out and reappear suddenly far away at other places on the island. he had seen our orb!!  me and m girlfriend immedialty told him what we had seen, it sounds like we both saw the same type of orb appearing and reappearing. he says he observed its activities for about 20 minutes from the porch outside before it dissapeared. he never saw any object enter or exit the sound though. he has never been open about ufo's or anysuch phenomena, and thinks it silly. i was very surprised when he told me without knowing what me or my girlfirend had seen a matching description of this object fluttering around, i think it genuinley had him baffled, and he is not one to be baffled easily. anyways, maybe it is worth checking out. i wonder if anybody else on the island this week has observed any of this activity, especially in or around the side of the pamlico sound.
content.summary: Saw a bright "comet" like ufo take off out of the water, then re-enter water after about five minutes. this was followed by a randomly flashing orb that appeared in several locations for several minutes. seen following night by another witness.

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were sitting on our front porch in adin, ca having a discussion. she had just arrived home from a 10-day trip out of the area. my house is located at the edge of our tiny town. the front porch runs east to west with an excellent view of town and surrounding areas. i noticed very large orb rise up due east just behind the radio facility  hill located adjacent to town and in front of hunters ridge . i was rather startled by the size of the object. i immediately told her "there's an orb! look at the orb!" she couldn't see the object, so i scrambled off the porch and found a place in the yard on the eastside of the porch where we would both have a clear view. we watched the orb rise up and move to the south behind the small hill, and then come back in a northern direction where we could view it again. the object hovered for about a minute, ascended some feet then moved to the west directly toward us. my partner exclaimed "that aint natural!". the orb suddenly vanished. the object was located approximately 4 to 6 miles away due east. it never ascended higher than hunter ridge located behind it. the orb looked like it ascended out of the ash creek/rivalier canyon area(s).

i'm really puzzled about these objects. i've seen quite a few orbs in this valley, but never one so large in appearance. i was relieved that i had another witness who saw exactly the same thing i did!
content.summary: Viewed orb-like object from front porch.

content.detailedDescription: Driving back from huntsville alabama to scottsboro. a car was stopped on the side of the road. i slowed down to see what was wrong. and looked up seeing the craft. i had no idea what i was seeing. but couldn't look away. i don't remember driving away till i got down the road ( u.S. highway 72. i was 19 at the time. before i saw the object when i was younger i felt i would wake up in bed with only the memories of someone coming and going back to the woods behind my house. i have never told anyone. after this i can't stand looking at rotation of red green or blue lights. it was triangle with a large red light in the middle and white lights at the corner. please help me.
content.summary: Hovering above a field. i couldn't take my eyes off of it

content.detailedDescription:
I'm always keeping eye open for people who had similar experiences as mine.  just noticed someone in same area had witnessed star-like formations in sky south of ottawa only yesterday (july 18, 2015 in ottawa/barrhaven).  the description appears to be similar to my own experience in november 1979 (only days before my near fatal car accident dec 2, 1979).  
i was staying in an old farmhouse (being renovated/no phone) south of ottawa, ontario, canada. it was dark, late, don't know the exact time.  through the window i saw multi color-changing glowing star-like globes "dancing" in the sky doing perfect (and i mean perfect) geometrical formations i.E. bursting apart and coming together perfectly (50 - 100?, the sky was full of them).  i began to feel they were trying to communicate with me and i remember trying not to be scared, but i was alone in a desolate place.  every time i went to the window they were still there dancing-like in the sky.  eventually i laid down on the bed there (with the light on), wanting to sleep but i was too pumped!  i heard an unusual rather sonic "helicopter" sound in distance and approaching (never heard this exact sound before).  it hovered (extremely loud pulsating sound) directly above the roof where i lay and i became totally immobilized, unable to move anything.  it was so loud that the house shook.  all i could feel physically was my heart pumping extremely hard.  as my heart nearly exploded (literally!)i prayed and telepathically tried to communicate that please nothing appear or it will explode.  i heard a (male) voice speak "she's not ready yet", and the sonic helicopter sound (wooh wooh wooh) drifted off as it drifted in and i became able to move again.   i didn't know what time it was to begin with, so don't know if any time loss.  (i've kept this experience mostly to myself for many years, very few have heard).
i had a different experience with a tall alien being earlier in the seventies.  he had a beautiful human like face with a huge bald head in a long burgundy gown. he communicated to me telepathically and cast an enormous feeling of peace that i can not describe. at the time, i remember being given understanding of everything, but now i don't know what that was!  it occurred in the same room that i was in and seemed very very real.  it was very inspiring experience, and i was shown my child son at least 16 years before he was born.  i will never forget it, but i think that could be too easily tossed off as a dream.
content.summary: Up to 100 colored star like orbs in sky; loud hovering craft that immobilized me

content.detailedDescription:
My location was on the hill above my home at about 10:40 pm pst.I was taking pictures of venus and jupiter trying to keep a record of the planets while they moved toward their conjunction in july. when looking through the view finder on my camera, an orb appeared. it just materialized suddenly, traveled a short distance, then dissappeared. i just took the shot.

we have so much unidentified craft activity up in this area that i was rather blase about the whole thing. i felt exctted about capturing a photo, but not too excited about the orb itself.
content.summary: Was taking pictures of venus and jupiter on a camera with tripod when an orb appeared in the view lense. i took the picture.

content.detailedDescription: Dark sky no stars were visible, no audible noises from any engine. the first one dropped approx. 3-4 miles down then went straight across going south. then another one appeared 2-3mins later.
content.summary: Red none-blinking sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a saint tropez beach, in france, and remarked previously a blurr on my camera lens , to be sure  before sending it to maintenance, i decided to take some pictures of a clear blue sky with no clouds, to have clear example of the problem. i took 6 pictures, with the sun in the back, to be sure there will not be any inerference, or so.

on one of them , i remarqued a trail and an object at right end of the trail, spherical, it seemed to be something as a very fast moving white sphere , leaving a trail, like car lights you can take at night with long exposure.

i have the gps data, the aperture f/5, the focal ( 46.6 mm )  and speed 1/640s the camera was a sony dsc hx20v

you can remark the object and trail at the upper left of the picture, and the camera blurr on the middle right. 

the trail shows that it moved from left picture edge to one fifth of the picture size during  1/640 of a second

depending on its distance , and for instance, if the object was the size of an helicopter, the speed could be around  8000 to 12000 km/h 

here is the picture

best regards

some time later and just to be sure, i took various pictures of planes at high altitudes, to compare , with the same camera, and the planes even if flying at around 900 km/h, just appear still on the pictures, no trail.
content.summary: Took a picture and saw the object later on the picture

content.detailedDescription:
El 10 de febrero del 2013 en la ciudad de sierra gorda en chile cerca de calama sucede lo inexplicables, a las tres de la madruga me encontraba de turno de nochero en la minera sierra gorda, en donde hubo una explosiã³n como si fuera una tronadura, en donde llego a mover los equipos de alto tonelaje, como un camiã³n caex 930-e-4, posterior a eso se pregunta al despacho por lo sucedido del gran ruido, despacho no sabe y no tiene conocimiento ya que las tronaduras son hechas en el dã­a .                                                                      por las normas y procedimientos que cada minera en chile se rige, nunca se genera una tronadura menos en la madrugada, asã­ que se tomã³ el protocolo de seguridad y silencio radial para consultar a cada operador de camiã³n,  si hubo algãºn neumã¡tico exploso, ya que estos son inflados con nitrã³geno a 125 psi, pero fue negativo, se pidiã³ informaciã³n a otras mineras que estã¡n alrededor de esta, que son minera el tesoro, esperanza, minera espence, hasta carabineros de chile pero ellos tampoco tenã­an ningãºn evento o informaciã³n, posterior a eso sucede lo inexplicable ya que en el ambiente se siente como un zumbido y aparecen alrededor, de 6 a 13 luces que parpadeaban, en primer lugar estando estã¡ticas,  sin movimiento pero de un segundo a otro se empiezan a mover,  con direcciones distinta hasta llegar a para de un momento a otro, o de cambiar de velocidad de rumbo en ese momento toda la minera fue testigo de esto ya que estã¡bamos, justo a ir a colaciã³n ,yo grabe desde mi cã¡mara estas luces y los sonidos ya que siempre ando con ella y cuando la paso al computador me encuentro con otra sorpresa,  que una de las luces se acercã³ mucho y afecto en parte, y no lo comprendo en mi grabaciã³n de llegar a cambiar el color,   bueno aãºn tengo la grabaciã³n y la subã­ youtube.
al otro dã­a entramos al turno otra vez, de nochero ya que es 7x7 y ya con esta adrenalina al lã­mite. ya que se seguã­a comentando el suceso, cargo mi cã¡mara y la preparo, por su pasaba algo o grabar,  fuimos con unos compaã±eros al depã³sito de repuestos de equipos de la minera,  y al llegar nos encontramos con un halo de luz muy intenso,  de color pãºrpura en donde estaba en un cajo de un repuesto, y esto empezã³ a formarse en un ser no mã¡s de un metro de estatura, mis compaã±ero y yo quedamos helado, de ver  tan espectacular cosa que al estar ya formado y parado sobre este cajã³n se le notaba su cabeza, cuerpo, brazos, y con un haz de luz que lo sostenã­a  sobre el cajo, quedamos congelados y mi compaã±era, me dice sã¡cale una foto saco la cã¡mara rã¡pidamente y me baje de la camioneta, y me puse a sacarle simultaneas fotos, ya que esta cosa se dio cuenta y con una rapidez,  que no se puede explicar sale de ahã­ y solo deja una estela de luz, sin aun comprender,  pero en mi hay algo que me llama mucho la atenciã³n,  estas cosas o lo que sucede y querã­a compartirlo con ustedes. desde ya muchas gracias estarã© atento a su comentario.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Era un tipo cilindro en donde de el calleron mas de 6 a 10 esferas que iluminaron el cielo por mas de unos minutos

content.detailedDescription: We had bought a century home and we had been doing a long drawn out diy job of renovating the old place as it was in desperate need of being done. the old wood and burnable trash we would cart down to the back of our long thin property and burn it on summer and fall evenings. we left it to grow wild down there and a small stream runs through, so it was a pleasant way to spend the evening. we would watch the fire,listen to the coyotes yipping by in packs,the frogs croaking and the toads trilling, crickets and bats, and of course, gazing in awe and wonder at the magnificent stars in our amazing universe. there was a lot of wood to burn so this had been a regular activity for us for the last 2 yrs. we had a unobstructed  view of the s. , se. and sw. sky. on one beautiful, clear, cloudless evening, sheila had put the our baby girl to bed,  brought down the crib monitor so we could hear if she was in distress and she joined me down at fire.  at one point in the late evening i was looking straight out the back yard up at the sky when i spotted 3 bright stars, forming a perfect equilateral triangle. i immediately found it very strange that i had never noticed this formation of stars before. they stuck out like a sore thumb in this section of sky that i had observed on so many previous evenings. they were bright, but not unlike the very brightest stars. they would also appear to contain elements of yellow, orange and red but predominantly bright white. i pointed them out to my wife. she said something to confirm that she saw the formation too and no sooner had the words left her mouth (they formed a triangle with point at the top and the bottom 2 points parallel to the horizon)the bottom point to the west shot west from a stand still to instantaneous high speed. and i don't mean jet fast. i mean meteor fast.  leaving what i assume is the same visual "streak" that you see when a meteor streaks through the sky and disappeared, too fast for our eyes to follow or perhaps really disappearing? then another one would shoot off in another direction and then the other one did the same thing. at the same time one of the other crafts/lights would suddenly appear as a streak and stop dead in the same place it took off from soon forming the triangle again.  then they they would streak off in different directions and one by one zip back, stop instantly only this time forming different formations.  inverted  "l"  front facing "l" laying down "l" and straight 3 dot lines, vertical. horizontal ,45 degrees. and back to triangle again.  this went on for 15 minutes or so, finally they simply zipped away and didn't return. during this event i'm sure i was standing there with my mouth agape. i was awe struck.  we both were. at one point i remember asking sheila "are you seeing this too?" she replied in the affirmative. i also had strong feeling that this was a show, just for our benefit. that the only purpose was for a display. i felt no fear but my wife admits to feeling apprehensive.  (being an amateur pilot i am some what familiar with planes and g forces.) at another point during the event i said to sheila "we don't have stuff that does that."(meaning so obviously advanced technology) any human would dead instantly if not on take off for sure when they stop.  these things were going from zero to thousands of mph and thousands of mph to a sudden stop . i had never had much interest in flying saucers and space men and such since i was a kid. they just sort of faded away with all the challenges of life down here on earth.  when that 15 minute episode happened, 20 some odd years ago , our life and world view were changed forever. we have never had another encounter. i often wonder if there was a reason they showed for us or if we just happened to be in the right place at the right time. from then on you'll notice i'm always looking up,keeping my eyes on the skies!  i hope to have disclosure and an end to the truth embargo in my life time. it is the biggest,single most important discovery ever made on earth and people have a right to know the truth.  if those stupid, iron age, terrorist, divisive, superstitious, fairy tale, death cult religions can't handle it. too bad!!! where are the main stream scientists?  the proof is overwhelming at this point!  yet i'm still scoffed at by people when i tell my story.  most people are just like i was, consumed with the utter nonsense of the economy and world politics.  head placed firmly in the sand. kept in the dark.  the odd light news story presenting "both sides" temperature inversion, swamp gas, weather balloon indeed!.....Bilge!.
content.summary: We saw what we thought were stars, forming an equilateral triangle in a part of the sky we were familiar with that we had never seen before,suddenly shoot off in different directions at meteoric speeds!

content.detailedDescription: We were at the bruneau sand dunes observatory when we saw a bright light, the size of a star, it seemed very high and it was moving faster than anything else i had seen.  i have seen satellites at night before and this was brighter and much faster.  also witnessed by my stepson.  there was no sound.  as it moved closer west it disappeared.  the skies were clear.  there were many stars in the sky.
content.summary: Solid light, size of star, no sound, extreme speed east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
This incident occurred almost 50 years ago but i am just now getting up the nerve to talk about it. your show, hanger 1, helped me decide to contact you about this. 

my family and i were living in a rural area and this occurred in the spring around easter time. there was only one other house on our road with woods all around us. it was very isolated. i was about 14 or 15 years old and i had this vivid dream that a bright light came in my bedroom window and sucked me up into this operating type room. as i was being sucked up i saw that the craft was dull metallic gray. there were windows. the light was blinding.  i was terrified and the beings were very rough with me. i was being examined and poked. the beings were gray and had very large eyes. i remember being very cold and the light was intensely bright. the next thing i knew i was being dropped off at the end of my road where i walked back to my house and went back to bed. we never locked our doors at the time. when i woke the next morning my left arm was sore and when i looked at it there were three scars in a row. 

then a couple of weeks later i became extremely ill and stayed in bed for about a week. 

recently i did some research and found a ufo sighting report in my home town with a date that would have made me 14 years old.
content.summary: When i was around 14 years old or so i was abducted by aliens

content.detailedDescription: It was big black triangle i was amazed so was my brother he reached for my phone to record it you can only see a red blur but im sure someone that knows how to zoom in and adjust it can see something you have too look at the red beem on the video
content.summary: It was dark black with a shine on it and a red beam in the middle it was a big  triangle i only have video footage of it as  was moving away there was also people pulling over

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were on our way home to rochester, mn. it was about 2:00 am
and we were driving past the town of coates. i heard a low humming 
sound which got louder. i could feel a vibration all over my body. i looked
out of the passenger window and saw a bright light at tree top level about
200 feet away. i told my friend to stop the car and he started to get
hysterical. i got a tire iron from under my seat and i was going to check
it out. i got to the ditch and that is the last memory i had.
after undergoing hypnosis i was able to recall being hit by a blue beam
which carried me to the craft, where a ramp opened, and i was brought in-
side. a door opened and a tall grey with a normal sized grey entered. 
the tall grey had on a black jumpsuit. then a human entered, also wearing
a black jumpsuit. he was smiling and said there was no reason to be afraid.
"this is going to be a pure learning experience" and he brought me into the
cockpit area and told me to look outside the windows. the windows were one
way were i could see out, but the craft did not look like it had windows.
he showed me the control panel and how to operate it.  he took me into
another room where there were an assortment of monitors on the wall. he
said to follow along with the images and they will teach you what you
need to learn. i watched the images for about 2 hours and somehow i was
able to understand what i was watching. when he returned he told me it was
vital that i understand these things because there may come a time when they won't be here to teach me. i would have to continue the big plan in their place. he said he didn't know when that time would be as there are many factors involved that could change the outcome. then the 2 greys came back in the room and the ramp opened up.The smaller grey escorted me out of the craft and to my car. he put a small device on the side of my head and i became paralyzed and my vision went black. the next thing i remember was me and my friend pulling into a restaurant.  we were both in a daze and couldn't figure out how the time got to be 5:30 am. so we had a large chunk of missing time. since that time my friend has received flashbacks but doesn't want to be involved in anyway.
content.summary: Struck by a blue beam, brought into the craft, saw 2 greys and a human

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching lightning hoping i would see a storm from the hotel balcony, when i decided to look into the opposite direction and i could see a soft puff of light moving around behind the clouds hovering above the sanctuary of truth in pattaya, thailand. i continued to watch and i noticed another 2 or 3 different sized puffs of light floating behind the clouds showing no particular pattern of movement yet they seemed to dissolve and re appear at different heights and directions.  i called my husband to come and have a look and together we watched this amazing show of lights for another 25 minutes. at one point i got a little nervous and wanted to go inside as i felt one of the bigger lights got closer and larger in size. we didn't go back indoors instead we stood in amazement watching. after around 25 minutes they disappeared and to our shock so did the clouds they were dancing behind.
content.summary: Gentle glowing clouds moving around the sky faster than ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: I believe it was the fall of 1980 when a friend and i were leaving a third floor apartment facing the atlantic ocean in hollywood florida. after leaving apartment going down outdoor staircase we observed a silver disc shape craft coming down through the atmosphere creating an expanding cloud trail behind it before crashing into the ocean it made a 90 degree turn going east over over atlantic ocean. while standing there excited and baffled about what we had just seen two air force jets/ (f-16's possibly),came screaming north up the coastline crossing each other's path in the expanding cloud trail that came down through the atmosphere. we knew it was a ufo as we were watching it, when it made the turn over the ocean it was moving probably three times faster than the fighter jets that came up the coast to investigate. the craft was completely silent. after walking down the stairs to the parking lot their was a man in his car that asked us if we saw that thing and the three of us discussed what we had seen when the fighter jets made there way south again crossing in this expanding cloud trail that came down through the sky. it was kind of like the cloud trail created by the space shuttle when it exploded.
content.summary: Craft came down through atmosphere then took right angle turn over ocean going east

content.detailedDescription:
Observed similar brilliantly pulsating orange objects on july 4th and 5th 2015. please refer to that report for details. only differences were time observed (850pn) for the first one and was able to see one of them ascend directly over the ridge line to my wnw so 8 to 10 miles away. same flight pattern as before.
these 2 were not in "sequence" one after the other like the ones seen on the 4th and 5th and there was only 2 this time. second one was seen at 1045pm. 
strong thunderstorms were in the area at the time behind or further wnw of objects.
at that distance speed was significantly faster than estimated prior.
while impossible to say for sure it seemed like they are traveling eastward while ascending then turning to the northwest once at altitude. basing this on apparent brightness only.
they did seem to fly out of sight and not just diminish in brightness.
observed with 16x binocs again. no navigation lights just brilliant orange in glasses.
so that's like 8 or 9 on 3 nights within 2 weeks.
content.summary: 2 orange objects of varying brightness seen between 850pm and 1045pm ascended from horizon at wnw then turned nwand flew out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
July 18, 2015, from about 7:30 pm to 8:40 pm (mountain time), my wife and i were sitting out in our front yard patio. neighbors in the town home next to us were having a small dinner party out on their front patio. 

i love colorado skies and i'm always sitting back and enjoying them. on this evening i looked up and saw a clear, sharp, black dot motionless in the sky. 

i thought it might be a hawk or an eagle soaring as we see that several times each month. but this was much, much higher than any bird i'd ever seen. and it was not moving the way a soaring bird does (where they move slightly in all directions as they hold onto the wind). this thing wasn't moving at all. that got my attention. 

so i asked my wife to look up and see it. she did also and we speculated as to why it appeared to not move. i was too curious so i ran through the house to the garage to get a small pair of binoculars from my car. 

i got back out front and it was still there. so i steadied the little binoculars against the edge of a front porch pillar and scanned until i found the object. through the binoculars i could see it much closer. 

in my mind i told my self it was two birds fighting or mating--but remarkably not moving through the sky. 

it *may* have been slowly rotating, in a clockwise direction from my point of view. it was still so far away i couldn't see details but i was able to see that it was squarish, and had angular sides, with at least one light. 

the light was in the center and it was an orange-red. the squarish object was not perfectly clear but it appeared to be a square doughnut, with no doughnut hole. and instead of a tubular doughnut shape the tube was angular. 

i could see a few angular lines and that was about the only details i could see. 

due to the distance and lack of clarity it was difficult to focus on the object while steadying the binoculars. 

the object *may* have had three other much smaller, orange-red lights--but that may have also been a trick of the eye due to the bright light in the center. 

the bright light in the center didn't make sense because it was so much brighter than any aircraft running light. this bright light did not appear to be a reflection of the sun. it appeared to be a light coming from the object. 

after i'd looked at it with the binoculars i interrupted our neighbor's dinner party and asked them to look up into the sky at the black object. they did and when they saw it. i believe i remember them commenting on how it didn't appear to be moving in the sky. 

at this time i noticed that it had in fact been moving, slowly from se to sw--but not so that movement could be seen.
one of the neighbors said that it was probably a drone. although, as a sometimes curious former soldier (honorable discharge), i do look up drones and such but have never seen one anything like this object''s shape. 

i told them "we're probably being watched," and one of them waved to the object as if to say hello.

one of the people at the neighbor's dinner party got out their cell phone and was either taking pictures or video. 

i realized i wanted photos so i ran into the house, went upstairs and got my cell phone (iphone 6 plus). 

when i got back the object was just going behind clouds. it appeared again and i took three photos and a video--all steadied against the porch pillar as i had done with the binoculars. then the object was no longer visible. 

we stayed outside enjoying the evening about another 30 or 40 minutes and i kept watching to see if i could see it again. however the sun had set and the cloud mass high in the sky was such that it would continue to block visibility of the object if it kept going in the same direction. 

in the morning as i write this, i'd emailed the photos and video to my computer (in their original resolution), and i cannot see the object--even zooming in with photoshop. but i'm not an expert with photography so it may be there but i just can't see it. and i might not be looking in the exact right place.

i copied one of the photos and marked it up with approximate flight path, the date and some notes. 

the object seemed to become smaller from the beginning to the end of viewing it. so from that i believe that while it was heading something like se to sw (in our view) it was also heading more south, or gaining altitude. 

personal editorial

this didn't seem like anything extraterrestrial or paranormal to me. it wasn't really any kind of experience. 

other than the object moving so slowly that it seemed not to be moving, everything seemed normal as if it was an aircraft we could normally experience-but never had. 

i'm open to some ideas such as there is probably life on all the other gajillion planets out there but i'm skeptical that they would be able to find earth among the stars, and/or that they would care about earth and us. 

i'm also skeptical about government cover-ups and conspiracies as i believe it's almost impossible for anyone to keep a secret--especially in our information age where anyone and everyone would do anything to expose a government secret to gain fame or wealth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very clear, sharp black object noticed not moving in the sky. eventually seen to move from se to sw so slow it seemed not to move.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside had a veg barbi and water no weed no booze no steaks, stay in the matrix and eat the steaks, prime beef, rather be with prime creator. the hathors the pleiadies. bringers of the dawn, for paul is small but the archangel gabriel is mighty that brings life outside this manufactured society this dreamworld.  had special pyramid and a hairloss device a pleiadin photonic device, and shone it into the jungle in the night sky, there was only one light to start with, directed this beam into the night sky and another light appeared, spread this photonic light into the sky and the stars appeared. now that what amazing, close encounters of the human kind. the pleiadian message wake up before its too late. while we sleep they live. next month is the flyby of nirubi and the pole shifts, new earth the pleaidian prophecy 2015
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The lion sleeps no more

content.detailedDescription: I was outside standing on my front porch smoking a cigarette when i heard an incoming aircraft flying in the direction of local air terminal, about 3.5 miles from my location. i looked up in the sky to look for the craft, and saw the plane a few moments before it passed behind a cloud formation. an instant later, i noticed a white orb coasting along the same adjacent trajectory as the plane, an estimated 200-300 yards south of the airplane. i observed this white orb for several seconds, then lost sight of it for three or four seconds as it passed through another cloud formation. the orb emerged from behind the cloud formation, where it remained visible for not more than another seven or eight seconds, before it disappeared behind another cloud and beyond my scope of vision, subsequently. it traveled at a steady speed, effortlessly, from the northeast to the southwest. this sighting lasted about 16 seconds. i raised my voice and asked if anyone else could see it, to no reply. this object did not resemble anything of earthly origin. i was stunned about what i had observed but did not report what i had seen to the authorities for fear of ridicule. in the intervening period since the sighting, i felt my sense of responsibility and obligation grew, increasingly, to report what i observed, and am first doing so here.
content.summary: White orb coasts across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Read small description. out on back deck, really bright flash 2x, first noticed could tell not a star or outer atmosphere object, really bright flash 2x, first noticed could tell not a star, we were in shock and awe,eventually slowly faded away in the same area it was
content.summary: Hovering, quick direction changes, strong aura like no star, small foo fighters coming to and away from

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to smoke a cigarette. i was facing due west and became aware out of my periphery of a bright object to the north. this object was white, glowing, and easily 3-4x brighter than any star and 2-3x brighter than any observed planet. once i noticed it, i turned my attention to this object. as i watched it, it went from bright to very faint within a matter of seconds, as if accelerating away from my viewing position. within 10-15 seconds it was no longer viewable at all. i was able to see other stars in the sky in the area of this object, so it did not seem to move behind cloud cover. i stayed outside for another 20 minutes to see if i was able to observe the object again, but never was able to see anything in that direction that would replicate what i observed (allowing for there to be clouds i could not see). this is a phenomenon i have not previously observed in that direction prior and found it to be significant enough to file a report. i make no assumptions about what i saw, but it was definitely not a previously known aircraft. distance would have to have been greater than 3-5 miles from my position as an estimate, although i cannot know for certain. winds were light and variable and practically unobserved at the time of the incident. the light either grew faint until it could no longer be detected by the naked eye or accelerated away from my position in a straight line. i have observed aircraft, satellites, and the iss before, but this behaved differently than anything i have seen. it was stationary until it diminished from my viewing position.
content.summary: See long description

content.detailedDescription: This happened in may of 2014. my wife and i travel from canada to the gulf of mexico every year and stay for a month. we have been staying at the same address and same condo for the past five years. we often see coast guard and military helicopters fly along the coastline during the day and sometimes hear them after sunset. we often sit on the deck which faces west and watch the sunset. we also see many aircraft flying into tampa bay airport. this year, 2015, we witnessed some spectacular lightening storms over the gulf. on the horizon we also see three or four oil rigs but usually only when the tide is low. we cannot actually see the rigs but rather the lights coming off of them. where we live in kamloops, canada we are surrounded by mountains and we have often seen falling stars or meteors flash through the sky. in ten years living here i have personally seen over one hundred. i am only sharing my information with you because of a recent television show called hanger 1 and am wondering if anyone else may have come forward with similar information. i am not one who truly believes in ufo's but i am open to the possibility. my wife and i feel that we saw something completely unexplainable last year in may. we were sitting on our deck, fifth floor, talking and listening to the sound of the waves (we do not drink or do drugs) when we noticed a very fast moving reddish light streak across the sky. it had a meteor like similarity, which is what we thought at first until we noticed a second one. slower moving than a meteor but extremely fast. i have seen a few military jets but this was twenty or more times as fast. we were still looking west as it completely disappeared when another one went past, almost in the same orbit and flight path. it was to the south and appeared to be moving east to west before disappearing. there were three or four more spaced about 10-15 seconds apart, same orbit, speed and path, then disappeared.  after the fourth one i ran across our condo unit while my wife stayed on the deck and i opened our front door which faces east and stood on an outside landing looking at the eastern sky. two more objects streaked past. they were also noticed by my wife from the other side. then we saw nothing more but waited. they looked like they were streaking past over the oil rigs but judging the distance is extremely difficult. the sky was cloudless, the sun had already set and it was around 10-11pm. there was no sound or any trailing. even a meteor has a bit of a trailing streak but is usually white in color. the objects were very consistent in appearance and color. we were both very excited to witness this but even more when i went to watch the eastern sky. they just appeared the same way they disappeared. we talked about this for days and i documented the sighting on some website although i cannot remember what the website was.  what motivated me to share this is the show hanger 1. i believe that if more honest people shared there sightings we would be able to know more regarding the unknowns of this world. i am more convinced because of your show and the fact that many people like police officers and military personnel come forward witnessing these events from different places and areas. thanks.
content.summary: Several extremely fast moving jet like red lights across the gulf of mexico.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard facing north, when in my right field of vision i saw a red-orange glowing ball or orb of light in the distant northeastern sky. although i was in northeastern nj, i believe the orb was somewhere over rockland county, new york. it moved slowly from right to left (east to west path) because i went into the house to tell my husband to come out to see it. when he came out it was more in our direct line of sight but hadn't moved as far as i would have expected. at that point we also observed an airplane flying in a southwesterly direction that appeared as if it had crossed the path of the orb. as it continued to move left, tall trees in the yard blocked our view of it. we waited to see it move where there was a break in the trees and the sky could be seen, but it did not appear again and seemed to have just vanished. i did not observe any structure to the orb. it just seemed like a glowing ball.
content.summary: I observed a red-orange glowing ball or orb of light in the sky sometime around 10:45 pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was 6 years old (now 19) and i shared a room with my parents.It was very hot and humid in the summer in boston and my parents left the window slightly open. since it was so muggy, muggies than i was used to since this was our first summer in boston, i could not sleep and i was fussing in bed. i believe my parents had fallen asleep since they don't remember this incident. i remember feeling more fussy than usual and the lights of the city outside our apartment in the 3rd or 4th floor were bothering me so i kept trying to get under my bedsheets without letting them heat me up (but on top of it as a kid i had a phobia of not being covered by anything in the night so i was still under my bedsheets. for some reason i remember that the wrinkles in my bedsheets combined with the lighting and my imagination looked like angry faces so i turned away from them and towards the closet. between my bed and the closet there was a walk space (about 3 feet wide, the floor was light wood). as i turned and opened my eyes i noticed a figure under the covers- my head my under the covers and as the covers settled there was something else under them but far enough for some of the covers to settle between us obscuring my vision. immediately i moved the covers (they were pink and the lights outside as i remember them were strong enough to shine through and allow me to see this body, so now as i'm retelling the story i wonder if the sheets distorted the color of the body). when i created enough space under the covers to see the figure i noticed the following things: 
1. i was not particularly panicked which is strange since alien stories freaked me out as a kid. in fact for the time that i observed it (a few seconds before i reacted) it all felt very natural, even less shocking than if i had found my mom next to me, just startling and unexpected.
2. the creature had skin but it seemed moist the way a human's does when sweaty from a harsh fever but on top of it cold, very muggy maybe even mucousy. it was a bit wrinkly around the face/head.
3. it was moving in a way that reminds me of shivery breathing but i don't remember a nose or whether or not but was actually breathing the way we do. so i felt as though it were experiencing something like cold sweat fever chills.
4. it's eyes were closed and the eyelids were very large, wide set, wrinkly. i could tell the eyes must portrube a bit from its forehead.
5.The shape of the face and head was kinda cat like if cats did not have fur. particularly because it got larger and wider toward the top, and i could dimly see two folds of skin at either side that were tucked wrinkled against the main head structure. i describe them to myself to look like car ears if they had no cartilagous structure, were not perky and were set further to the front of the head. i'm not even entirely sure if it had a nose or mouth because i could see the skin had a different fold around those areas but i could not distinguish if there was actually any openings.
6. the creatures body was very thin and insubstantial, he must have been around the same size as me (4 feet?), it looked bipedal but i didnt really see anything below its (waist?).
7. arms were limp and folded in front of it, it had digits that looked thin and long but i don't remember how many, just that they were also folded at the wrist and curled.
8.The skin color was light grayish-greenish, and shiny again as if it was very sweaty.
9.I knew it was alive but had a sense its health was not well, it seemed barely aware of me if aware at all, almost as if it was passing out or extremely exhausted.
10. it was not wearing any clothes of any sort.

continuing the story after this recognition, which only happened within a few seconds however adrenaline must have kicked in because my heart was beggining to beat faster as i was realizing how unusual it was, and yet in my memory everything seemed to slow down. after that moment, i reacted by  pushing my arms out in front of me and flat against his very narrow chest. i heard a thump on the ground proper to something organic hitting the ground (not a solid thump like when a phone falls nor a squishy one like when food falls, it sounded like a moistened body). i felt as though telling my parents would be too much trouble or as if telling them would not comfort me in any way, i just accepted what happened and thought that it was such an indescribable and unusual thing that i would always be alone with it. i know that after this i quickly turned around toward the window again, however i cannot imagine that i could have slept immediately- i've always been one to lie awake recounting and analyzing thoughts, especially from something this eventful.I have no recollection of falling asleep or anything. the next thing i am able to recall is that i woke up later than usual and everyone including parents and brother were up. this was strange because they would normally wake me up to begin the day with me, it was a sunday. when i got up i went to look at where i had heard the body fall and noticed a (estimating 2 feet long, half a foot wide) moist pring on the floor similar to the one a person might leave if they had sweat on a shiny floor. i touched it and it was muggy and cool. i went to wash my hands and don't remember any textures... i just avoided the "thump" spot after that. i asked my mom if someone had spilt something but when she said no i simply did not want to bring up the subject. i did not expect anyone to validate my experience for what it was and i put it off from my mind. i remember and have written the experience down periodically so the details do not become obscured. but the ones i have written here come to mind clearly without having to look back at things i wrote as a kid. since then when the conversation of weird childhood experiences comes up with my social circles i have retold this experience,but my parents only seem to remember me telling them this a few times. my dad and i both remember that once we really went in depth with the experience while eating pizza at a costoco's and they asked me to draw the alien on a napkin. i don't have that napkin in my possesion. i have only written down details that i feel confident i remember and left out any ones that are too hazy or that i'm not certain of. in my life after this experience i have had other very very hazy memories that i could not be sure of as real or not. i just have the feeling that was not the only time i had an interaction with a non human intelligent being. none of these feel negative. i have another slightly clear memory when i was 15, but i will not report it because i'm not sure it wasn't a dream- but after it i had a weird skin reaction that i still get sometimes, and things in my room felt misplaced. at that point in my life i had been a vivid dreamer for some time. so i feel as though it is all too inconclusive to report as a certain and solid memory. anyway, i am finally reporting this experience so the details do not get fuzzier, and because i finally felt more trusting of mufon.Thank you so much for taking this experience, i am very interested in that it serves a positive role in the purpose of understanding these phenomena. i am willing to be contacted and interviewed, asled to redraw my imopression of it (since i dont have one at the time to submit) but only at my permission and if it is clear no negative repercussions may come of it. i appreciate this truth-seeking purpose very much. i would also be very interested to know how this report is used and if i can access any media that utilizes it.
content.summary: Found alien in my bed and pushed it away.
